content.text:
Funny enough, it was actually [this episode](http://www.danielvitalis.com/rewild-yourself-podcast/nora-gedgaudas-on-using-entheogens-to-free-our-minds-from-cultural-conditioning). Interesting notes:

- The host says "she works on neuro-feedback and the brain" but I don't think she's a neurologist.
- Both the host and guest seem to be into paleo and such?
- The thing I remembered was the guest talking about 24/7 *holotropic breathwork*, not a diet (starts at 18:00).
- I'm biased, but I found the other episodes on diet (especially the anti-vegan thing) to be a bit silly and unscientific.
- Otherwise, I'm looking forward to checking out other episodes and seeing if it's as cool as I remember!
